43.ara-name: كتاب الأدب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Samurah bin Jundab:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Wear white, for indeed it is very pure and cleaner, and shroud your dead in it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لُبْسِ الْبَيَاضِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Wearing White
